meanings.sent1: The school board decided to defund the art program.
meanings.sent2: The government may defund certain projects to save money.
meanings.sent3: I hope they don't defund the ice cream social; I love free ice cream!
meanings.sent4: The decision to defund the research team left them scrambling for support.
meanings.sent5: The community protested loudly when the city council voted to defund the library.

meanings.sent1: The company had to defund the expansion plans due to budget cuts.
meanings.sent2: The organization may defund the project if it does not show results.
meanings.sent3: It would be a strange world if we defunded all the snack machines.
meanings.sent4: The decision to defund the charity left many in need without support.
meanings.sent5: The mayor's proposal to defund the park maintenance caused an uproar among residents.
